        public static boolean nextBoolean()
        Return a random boolean value.
        Returns:
        True or false value simulating a coin flip.

      • nextBoolean

        public static boolean nextBoolean(double probability)
        This method simulates a weighted coin flip which will return true with the probability passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        probability - The probability that the method returns true, a value between 0 to 1 inclusive.
        Returns:
        True or false value simulating a weighted coin flip.

        This method returns a random integer.
        Returns:
        A random integer.

      • nextInt

        public static int nextInt(int n)
        This method returns a random integer between 0 and n, exclusive.
        Parameters:
        n - The maximum value for the range.
        Returns:
        A random integer between 0 and n, exclusive.

      • nextInt

        Return a number between min and max, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum integer value of the range, inclusive.
        max - The maximum integer value in the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        A random integer between min and max.
